item.description:
South Norwalk is the home base of our bill spliiter Mike, and he has chosen Kazu as the best sushi restaurant in that areas!...I have an event I am attending in Southport that day and thought it might be fun to have a sushi event too. I hope you might consider coming to my event as well...a fun family art event for a good cause (see also Covenant of Care http://www.covenantto... Come down to the lovely CT shorline and have some great sushi and company!

My art event in Southport is here:http://www.meetup.com...

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: SoNo Sushi - aka Bill Splitter Extraordinaire's new haunts!!
